attributes.action: Unequivocally reject the proposed UN resolution to criminalise religious inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A-RES-62-154 General Assembly Resolution 62/154 is a deliberate attempt to persicute those who criticise religion in direct violation to the Universal Decleration of Human Rights.

It will effectively make it illegal to question ideologies that cannot be substantiated with fact or logic and give a green light for religious people to persicute other religions (or secularists) for failing to conform to their ideas and ideologies.

In effect, it will become illegal to offend anyone on the basis of religion, regardless of reason, freedom of speech or common sense.

full details available here: http://www.UNdemocracy.com/A-RES-62-154.pdf
